title: Tacospigot —— 一个比papaerspigot还要快的服务端
author: QuantumCraft
txt_content:
本帖最后由 QuantumCraft 于 2016-3-6 12:57 编辑 

什么？paperspigot用着还卡？那你就可以试一试这款服务端，比paperspigot还要快很多(tacospigot是一个构建于paperspigot源码的东西，理论上兼容性跟paperspigot一样，也许差一点)以下内容引用原地址readme.md
TacoSpigotA even-higher higher performance PaperSpigot fork that adds new features.IRC Support and Project DiscussionContribution GuidelinesHow To (Server Admins)Download a copy of Paperclip.jar from our buildserver here: https://ci.techcable.net/job/TacoSpigotRun the TacoSpigot jar directly from your server. Just like old times We do this with Paperclip like PaperSpigot.TacoSpigot requires Java 8 or above.How To (Compiling From Source)To compile TacoSpigot, you need JDK8, git, bash, maven, and an internet connection.Clone this repo, run ./build.sh from bash, get files.Special Thanks To:YourKit, makers of the outstanding java profiler, support open source projects of all kinds with their full featured Java and .NETapplication profilers. We thank them for granting TacoSpigot an OSS license so that we can make TacoSpigot super-fast.人话版本：TacoSpigot这是一个比paperspigot更流畅更牛x的服务端点我进入IRC(这是一个聊天室)，解决你的问题构建指导
如何下载 (小白管理员专用)https://ci.techcable.net/job/TacoSpigotjre要求java8
运行方式跟spigot和bukkit一样
java -jar -Xms1g -Xmx4g TacoSpigot.jar
本人用的脚本(linux)while :dojava -d64 -server -XX:+UseFastAccessorMethods -XX:+OptimizeStringConcat -XX:MetaspaceSize=1024m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=2048m  -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseStringDeduplication -Xms4G -Xmx16G -noverify -XX:hashCode=5 -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -jar TacoSpigot-28.jar nogui --log-strip-colorsleep 2done（代码文字乱码）
如何构建 (源代码编译出来拉，要linux和jdk8)
cd ~mkdir taco-buildcd taco-buildgit clone https://github.com/TacoSpigot/TacoSpigotcd TacoSpigotbash build.sh下面是作者自己的特别感谢，大致意思是受到他们支持巴拉巴拉，广告不翻译了～YourKit, makers of the outstanding java profiler, support open source projects of all kinds with their full featured Java and .NETapplication profilers. We thank them for granting TacoSpigot an OSS license so that we can make TacoSpigot super-fast.

replies.author: xcc
replies.txt_content: 然而还是没有兼容模组与插件的端：D

replies.author: QuantumCraft
replies.txt_content: 觉得不错的话留个言吧！
